QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, case when contrast != '' or contrast is not null then concat(concat(procedure,'|'), contrast) else procedure end as source_value, encounterdate, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, 0 concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_imaging l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
